meanings.sent1: The surprise party will beatify her with joy.
meanings.sent2: Winning the game will beatify his mood.
meanings.sent3: The delicious cake beatified everyone's taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful sunset beatified the evening sky.

meanings.definition: To declare to be blessed or holy
meanings.sent1: The priest will beatify the saint during the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The pope will beatify the new martyr.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to beatify the mouse before pouncing.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins beatify the sacred land.
meanings.sent5: The special ritual will beatify the sacred object.
